label: Revenue (IFRS/MFRS Core)
description: Income from ordinary activities with customers under MFRS/IFRS. Statutory revenue line in P&L.

label: Other Income (IFRS/MFRS)
description: Non-revenue income such as grants, rental, and miscellaneous income.

label: Gains (IFRS/MFRS)
description: Gains from disposals, remeasurements, or FX that are presented separately from revenue.

label: Sales (Operational Gross Sales)
description: Gross sales value used for operational KPIs (POS, invoice sales) before IFRS adjustments.

label: Units Sold / Sales Quantity
description: Number of units sold. Used for volume KPIs and operational analytics.
